Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 18 Mar 2019Please don't. Penny stocks are really high risk, can be easily manipulated.Extremely low liquidity and bigger spreads, it will be hard to exit if anything goes wrong. https://www.channelnewsasia.com/news/singapore/mastermind-of-2013-penny-stock-crash-charged-for-manipulating-76922420 comments0
